trans-unit.source: Provides <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods for retrieving feature information from the current system.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>用于从当前系统中检索功能信息的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the `static` methods of this class when the classes you query for feature information implement the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport> interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用`static`此类当你查询的类信息的方法实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, inherit from FeatureSupport and provide your own implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否则为从 FeatureSupport 继承，并提供您自己的实现。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this class, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature>.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实现，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature>

trans-unit.source: To get the version number of a feature, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的功能的版本号，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A> to determine if a particular feature or version of a feature is installed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A>以确定是否安装了特定的功能或功能的版本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取指定是在系统上可用的功能的版本。

trans-unit.source: Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build.
trans-unit.target: 版本号由三个部分组成︰ 主要、 次版本号和生成。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。

trans-unit.source: The feature whose version is requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求其版本功能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> representing the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Version>表示指定的功能在系统中; 上可用的版本号或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不安装该功能。</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定是在系统上可用的功能的版本。

trans-unit.source: Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build.
trans-unit.target: 版本号由三个部分组成︰ 主要、 次版本号和生成。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number".
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。

trans-unit.source: See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅包含的功能，以确定要传递给的名称的产品的文档`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the class to query for information about the specified feature.
trans-unit.target: 类的查询指定的功能有关的信息完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref> interface or inherit from a class that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref>接口或继承自实现此接口的类。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找功能的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> with the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Version>与指定的功能在系统中; 上可用的版本号或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不安装该功能。</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is installed in the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在系统中已安装指定的任何的功能版本。

trans-unit.source: The feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the feature is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的功能是，存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在系统中安装指定的功能的指定或较新版本。

trans-unit.source: The feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的功能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Version>表示要查找为的功能的最低版本号</xref:System.Version>，

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该功能是否存在并且其版本号是大于或等于指定的最低版本数;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未安装的功能或其版本号低于指定的最小数目。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is installed in the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在系统中已安装指定的任何的功能版本。

trans-unit.source: This method is <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅包含的功能，以确定要传递给的名称的产品的文档`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the class to query for information about the specified feature.
trans-unit.target: 类的查询指定的功能有关的信息完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref> interface or inherit from a class that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref>接口或继承自实现此接口的类。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找功能的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified feature is present; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the specified feature is not present or if the product containing the feature is not installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的功能，存在;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果指定的功能不存在或未安装包含该功能的产品。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否在系统中安装指定的功能的指定或较新版本。

trans-unit.source: This method is <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅包含的功能，以确定要传递给的名称的产品的文档`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the class to query for information about the specified feature.
trans-unit.target: 类的查询指定的功能有关的信息完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: This class must implement the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref> interface or inherit from a class that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类必须实现<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport"></xref>接口或继承自实现此接口的类。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找功能的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> representing the minimum version number of the feature.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Version>表示功能的最低版本号。</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该功能是否存在并且其版本号是大于或等于指定的最低版本数;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未安装的功能或其版本号低于指定的最小数目。
